snippet: Silvercup, based in Queens, announced it was converting a Bronx warehouse into a 115,000-square-foot complex for film and television productions, scheduled to open in June 2016.
abstract: Silvercup Studios in Queens announces plans to convert Bronx warehouse into 115,000-square-foot production complex for film and television; $35 million project is first expansion for company outside its home borough and is due to open by June 2016.
lead_paragraph: Silvercup, based in Queens, announced it was converting a Bronx warehouse into a 115,000-square-foot complex for film and television productions, scheduled to open in June 2016.

headline.main: Silvercup Studios Is Turning a Bronx Warehouse Into Its 3rd Production Complex
headline.print_headline: Queens Studio Is Turning a Bronx Warehouse Into Its 3rd Production Complex
